      • shutdownFlow

        public boolean shutdownFlow(boolean clearSession)
        Start the flow shutdown process
        Parameters:
        clearSession - true if this is a final shutdown, false if session data is still needed (like in a reinitialisation)
        Returns:
        boolean Success

                        java.lang.String AoR,
                        MessagingEvent.MessagingEventCategory event)
        Add an subscribe to a list of events for a specific device
        Parameters:
        listener - The class which extends the SubscribedEventListener abstract class, to listen for these events
        AoR - The device address to listen to
        event - The event to listen for
